dev.tools.title: Developer Tools
dev.storage.title: Developer Token Storage
dev.storage.use_local.tooltip:
Enabled: Token stored in EditorPrefs (local, not tracked by version control)
Disabled: Token stored in project settings (can be committed, suitable for team sharing)
dev.storage.local_mode: Local Mode: Token stored in local EditorPrefs, not tracked by Git. Suitable for personal development.
dev.storage.project_mode: Project Mode: Token stored in project settings, can be committed to version control. Suitable for team sharing (private repos).
dev.token.title: Developer Token (Optional)
dev.token.label: Token
dev.token.ignore.tooltip: Force player authentication flow for testing
dev.player_token.clear.title: Clear Player Token
dev.player_token.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the local player token? You'll need to login again on next run.
dev.player_token.clear.success.title: Success
config.recharge.title: Recharge Configuration
config.recharge.channel_type.tooltip: Current game's distribution channel (auto-synced from selected game)
config.recharge.channel_type.auto_sync: üí° Distribution channel is automatically synced when you select a game. No manual configuration needed.
config.recharge.enable_default_handler.t: Enable SDK's built-in recharge UI (shows when balance is low). Disable to implement your own custom recharge flow.
config.recharge.show_balance_popup.toolt: Automatically show a popup when balance changes (consumption or recharge).
Keep the balance popup always visible on screen instead of auto-hiding after showing changes.

about.examples.not_found: No example scenes found in the SDK.
common.failed: Failed to load PlayKit settings. Please check console for errors.
update.check_failed.title: Update Check Failed
update.available.title: SDK Update Available
update.no_updates.title: No Updates Available
update.no_updates.message: You are using the latest version ({0}).
language.selector.title: Language
config.basic.title: Basic Settings
config.advanced.title: Advanced Settings
config.advanced.info: Only modify these settings if you know what you're doing.
config.advanced.custom_url.label: Custom Base URL
config.advanced.custom_url.tooltip: Override the default API base URL. Leave empty to use default (https://api.playkit.ai).
config.build_token.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è DANGER ZONE - Build Token Injection
config.build_token.warning: WARNING: Injects developer token into builds. Token will be embedded in the build and accessible via decompilation. ONLY use for internal testing builds, NEVER for production!
config.build_token.enable: Force Developer Token Injection At Build
config.build_token.status_enabled: ‚ö†Ô∏è ENABLED - Developer token will be injected into builds
config.build_token.status_disabled: ‚úì DISABLED - No token injection (safe for production)
config.build_token.enable_confirm.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Enable Build Token Injection?
config.build_token.enable_confirm.messag:
This will inject your developer token into ALL future builds.

‚ö†Ô∏è SECURITY RISKS:
‚Ä¢ Token embedded in build executable
‚Ä¢ Anyone who decompiles can extract the token
‚Ä¢ Token provides API access with your credentials

ONLY enable this for:
‚Ä¢ Internal testing builds
‚Ä¢ Development/staging environments

NEVER enable for production or public releases!

Are you sure you want to enable this?
config.build_token.disable_confirm.title: Disable Build Token Injection?
config.build_token.disable_confirm.messa:
Future builds will no longer inject the developer token.

This is the recommended setting for production builds.
build.token_injection.error.no_token.mes:
Developer token injection is enabled, but no developer token found in EditorPrefs.

Please configure a developer token in Tools > PlayKit SDK > Settings first, or disable 'Force Developer Token Injection At Build'.
build.token_injection.security_warning.m:
You are about to build with DEVELOPER TOKEN INJECTION enabled!

‚ö†Ô∏è RISKS:
‚Ä¢ Your developer token will be embedded in the build
‚Ä¢ Anyone who decompiles the game can extract the token
‚Ä¢ The token provides API access with your credentials

This feature should ONLY be used for:
‚Ä¢ Internal testing builds
‚Ä¢ Development/staging environments

NEVER use this for production or public releases!

Token preview: {0}

Do you understand the risks and want to proceed?
dev.device_auth.title: Browser Login
dev.device_auth.info: Login with your browser to automatically get a developer token. This is the recommended way to authenticate.
dev.device_auth.success_message: Developer token has been obtained and saved successfully.
dev.device_auth.not_developer: You are not a developer. Please create a game in the PlayKit dashboard first.
dev.device_auth.register_hint: To become a developer, visit https://playkit.ai/dashboard and create your first game.
npc.editor.title: NPC Client
npc.editor.subtitle: AI-powered NPC conversation system
npc.editor.info: Configure your NPC's personality, chat model, and reply prediction settings.
npc.character.design.label: Character Design / System Prompt
npc.character.design.help: Define the NPC's personality, background, speaking style, and behavior rules.
npc.chat.model.label: Chat Model Configuration
npc.chat.model.help: Leave empty to use the default model configured in PlayKit Settings.
npc.prediction.title: Reply Prediction (Suggestion)
npc.prediction.help: Automatically generate predicted player responses after the NPC replies.
npc.prediction.enable.tooltip: When enabled, predicts 3-4 possible player responses after each NPC reply
npc.prediction.event.hint: Subscribe to 'OnReplyPredictionGenerated' event to receive predictions.
npc.runtime.clear_confirm.title: Clear Conversation History
npc.runtime.clear_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to clear all conversation history? The character design will be preserved.
npc.modules.title: Attached Modules
npc.actions.editor.title: NPC Actions Module
npc.actions.editor.info: Configure actions that this NPC can perform. Each action will be converted to an AI tool call.
npc.actions.action.name: Action Name
npc.actions.param.name: Name
voice.editor.title: NPC Voice Module
voice.editor.subtitle: Speech-to-text for NPC conversations
voice.editor.info: Configure voice transcription settings for this NPC.
voice.microphone.recorder.help: Optional: Link a PlayKit_MicrophoneRecorder for integrated recording
mic.editor.title: Microphone Recorder
mic.editor.subtitle: Audio recording with VAD support
mic.vad.threshold.tooltip: Volume level below which audio is considered silence (0.0 - 1.0)
mic.vad.max_silence.tooltip: Stop recording after this many seconds of silence
addons.title: Addons
addons.description: Extend PlayKit SDK with additional platform integrations.
addons.exclusion_info: Only one distribution channel addon (Steam, iOS, Android) can be enabled at a time.
addons.none_registered: No addons registered. Install platform addons to extend SDK functionality.
addons.install.title: Install Addons
addons.install_required: This addon must be installed via Package Manager or manually.
addons.conflict_disabled: {0} was automatically disabled because {1} is enabled (exclusion group: {2})
addons.steam.title: Steam Authentication & Payment Addon
addons.steam.description: Add Steam platform support to PlayKit SDK, including Steam authentication and microtransaction payment features.
addons.steam.install_success.title: Installation Started
addons.steam.install_success.message: Steam Addon installation has started. Please wait for Unity Package Manager to complete the installation.
addons.steam.install_error.title: Installation Failed
addons.steam.remove_confirm.title: Remove Steam Addon
addons.steam.remove_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove the Steam Addon?

steam.header.title: PlayKit Steam Addon - Debug Window
steam.header.subtitle: Monitor Steam status and test IAP purchases
steam.status.title: Steam Status
steam.status.initialized: Steam is running and initialized. You can test purchases in Play Mode.
steam.status.not_initialized:
Steam is not running or not initialized.

To test Steam features:
1. Launch Steam client
2. Enter Play Mode
3. Steam will auto-initialize
steam.config.title: Steam Configuration
steam.config.help:
Steam App ID is configured in PlayKit Dashboard.
Select a Steam channel game in PlayKit Settings to use Steam features.
steam.products.title: IAP Products
steam.products.no_products:
No products configured.
Configure IAP products in PlayKit Dashboard.
steam.purchase.title: Test Purchase
steam.purchase.need_play_mode:
Enter Play Mode to test purchases.
Steam purchases can only be tested at runtime.
steam.purchase.not_initialized:
Steam is not initialized.
Make sure Steam client is running.
steam.purchase.no_products:
No products available.
Load products first.
steam.purchase.warning:
This will initiate a real Steam purchase flow.
The Steam overlay will appear if configured correctly.
Make sure you're testing with a development build.
